long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Of course, if you’re really, really impatient, then you can fish the “easy way” by dropping a bomb into the water and watch the flopping fish fly! With each bomb dropped, you will see a leap in your score. Time it well, make sure a lot of fish are around, and let her fly. Now that is a true Fishing Frenzy, arcade style!
